level_tutorial.dialog_one: O God! O God! we're all going to die!
level_tutorial.dialog_two: Here is a gun meet me by the exit.

level_one.dialog_one: Our first objective is their prison camps.

level_two.dialog_one: Our next objective is their communications array.
level_two.dialog_three: All your base are belong to us!

level_three.dialog_three: We're not gonna die. You know why? Because we are so...very...pretty.

level_four.dialog_one: We are prepared for the final assault. Are you ready for this?
level_four.dialog_three: Your no techno viking but you'll do.
